activities: Steelwedge Software, Inc. (“Steelwedge”) helps its customers implement and improve their Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) processes.  Steelwedge accesses the personal data of its E.U.-based customers in order to be able to provide its customers with its S&OP services.  The information accessed is limited to customer name and business contact information.  Steelwedge also collects personal data on its web site in order to provide its users with educational content.  The information collected on the web site is limited to name, job title, company name, and business contact information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data and web site user data is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework.  Customer data and web site user data are processed on-line, off-line, and manually.
recoursemech: For unresolved complaints, Steelwedge will cooperate with the European Union data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
